Disabled_Description: Setting to true disables the module
Theme_Description: Default theme used by mobile version
ThemeList_Description: List of themes available in mobile version
IncludeInMobile_Description: If true, the module is used in mobile version of the interface
IncludeInDesktop_Description: If true, the module is used in desktop version of the interface
RequireInMobile_Description: List of other modules required by this module
